title: Phu Quoc Beachfront Paradise with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktail & One-Time Dinner
description:
Immerse yourself in sun-kissed splendour, stroll along palm-lined beaches and experience unparalleled tropical luxury at this family-friendly haven in the heart of Phu Quoc. Ideally situated on the sandy shores of Bai Dai Beach, this Indochine-styled resort offers Vietnamese luxury with well-appointed rooms, five restaurants, the Sim bar and an expansive outdoor pool.

Enhance your stay with a visit to VinWonders, Vietnam's highest-rated amusment park and one of southeast Asia's favourites thanks to its high-tech attractions. Here, explore captivating themed zones like Fantasy World and Viking Village, enjoy thrilling rides such as the 'Wrath of Zeus' roller coaster and witness spectacular shows.

Start each day with a delightful breakfast, then enjoy endless summer on the pristine 3.5km private beach or tee off at the nearby 18-hole golf course. After a day of fun, unwind with a luxurious treatment at Akoya Spa, and savour a cocktail each evening as the sun sets, making your retreat truly unforgettable.
offer_address: Bai Dai, Ganh Dau, Phu Quoc Island, Kien Giang 920000, Vietnam

title: Grand Opening: All-Inclusive Indulgence at the Radisson Blu Phu Quoc
description: Be amongst the first to experience the brand-new Radisson Blu Phu Quoc, located on the beachfront of tranquil Bai Dai Beach, on Vietnam's lushest island. Take holiday luxury to a new level, staying in an extra-spacious Deluxe Room with all-inclusive dining, three nightly cocktails per person, unlimited access to the Beach Front Water Park, return airport transfers and a local gift from Phu Quoc’s popular night market. PLUS two kids aged 11 years and under stay for free with daily breakfast and free access to the resort’s Giggles’ Kids Club included.
offer_address: Ganh Dau Beach, Phu Quoc District, Ganh Dau, Phu Quoc, Vietnam

title: Phu Quoc: Beautiful Pool Villas with All-Inclusive Dining & Spa Treatments
description: Escape to Vietnam’s paradise island of Phu Quoc in the Gulf of Thailand, where white sand beaches meet lush tropical jungle. Relax and unwind in a huge and secluded villa with a private pool at Fusion Resort Phu Quoc, the island’s only all-inclusive spa resort. Your escape includes daily breakfast ‘anywhere, anytime’, lunch, dinner and unbelievable spa treatments are all included for you, plus complimentary shuttle transfers between the airport and the resort and the local town, Duong Dong.
offer_address: Hamlet 4, Vũng Bầu Beach, Cửa Cạn Ward,, Phú Quốc, tỉnh Kiên Giang 950000, Vietnam

title: Lavish Beachfront Phu Quoc Pool Villa Paradise with All-Inclusive Dining, Free-Flow Drinks & Airport Transfers
description:
The pristine beaches and mesmerising lakeside vistas of Vietnam’s ‘Pearl Island’ await at the five-star Meliá Vinpearl Phu Quoc - a haven of natural tranquillity. With stunning private pool villas, this dream destination is the perfect escape for couples seeking luxurious seclusion, and groups of friends and families looking to create unforgettable memories in paradise. Take advantage of the resort’s glorious location with an evening spent sipping cocktails by the sea as you watch the sun set below the glimmering horizon, followed by a wholesome movie night, cosied up on a beanbag with snacks at the ready, at the cinema on the beach.

Spend each day moving between dips in the pool, indulging in lavish spa treatments, or making the most of the nearby beach with a range of watersports on offer including jet skiing and kayaking in transparent boats. The best of this luxury resort doesn’t stop there, with three onsite restaurants so you can savour sublime dishes in the dreamiest of tropical destinations. Sabbia restaurant sets the stage for unforgettable evenings, with the glamorous interior and international fine dining flavours set against the backdrop of the pool and sparkling beach.
offer_address: Bai Dai, Ganh Dau, Phu Quoc Island 920000, Vietnam

title: Island Villa Paradise with Daily Dining, Spa Treatments & Cocktails
description: Five-star paradise exists in the Gulf of Thailand on the tropical island of Phu Quoc, where crystal-clear water laps at pristine white sand beaches and meets lush tropical jungle. Find true relaxation in a secluded private pool villa at Fusion Resort Phu Quoc, where you’ll be treated to daily breakfast ‘anywhere, any time’, your choice of daily lunch or dinner, a daily cocktail and any two spa treatments per person daily, plus return airport transfers from Phu Quoc airport and complimentary shuttle transfers between the resort and Duong Dong downtown.
offer_address: Hamlet 4, Vũng Bầu Beach, Cửa Cạn Ward,, Phú Quốc, tỉnh Kiên Giang 950000, Vietnam

vendor_name: Sheraton Phu Quoc Long Beach Resort
title: Sheraton Phu Quoc Beachfront Luxury with 60-Minute Massage, Airport Transfers & All-Inclusive Meals (Select Packages Only)
description:
Discover a world of tropical bliss at the five-star Sheraton Phu Quoc Long Beach Resort, positioned on the western golden shores of Vietnam’s most beloved island. This beachfront playground offers direct access to the powder-white shores of Long Beach and features four bars and restaurants, a Balinese-inspired spa retreat and an expansive lagoon pool lined with endless sunloungers. Savour locally-caught seafood served with specular ocean views at Prime Bar & Grill, avant-garde cocktails at Beach House, and Pan Asian fusion at Wok & Curry, or head to Anchovy for international favourites served to overlook the beautifully manicured gardens.

When it's time to explore beyond the resort there's no shortage of fun-filled activities: venture out into the crystal-clear waters on a kayak or paddleboard, up the adrenaline with a thrilling jet-ski ride or spend the day shoreside venturing through local markets. Travelling with kids? Treat them to a day at the Vinpearl Safari Phu Quoc zoo and conservation park, only 20 minutes from the hotel, or the VinWonders Phu Quoc amusement park.
offer_address: Bai Dai area, Tp. Phú Quốc, 920000, Vietnam

title: Beachfront Phu Quoc Island Retreat with Daily Breakfast, Dining Credit & Hon Thom Cable Car Ride
description:
Give your mind and soul what they deserve with a stay at the elegant New World Phu Quoc Resort, boasting the region's longest pool and direct access to Southern Vietnam's most spectacular beach. Relaxation and adventure seamlessly combine here, making this resort the ultimate family retreat. Kids will love the 120-metre infinity pool, while adults can indulge in 'me' time at the spa, enjoying beautifying treatments. Dine on contemporary fare and sip icey concoctions across five venues, whether at the beach, by the pool or in the chic surrounds of the resort.

Beyond the resort, the paradisiacal landscapes of Phu Quoc await. Ride the iconic Hon Thom Cable Car, the world's longest sea-crossing cable car, up to the Aquatopia Water Park for a grand splash. Have a taste of the Italian coast in Meditteranean Town, eat your way through the night market or adventure into the awe-inspiring Phu Quoc National Park - Vietnam's beauty knows no bounds.
offer_address: Khem Beach, Phu Quoc City, Kien Giang Province 92550, Vietnam

title: Five-Star Pullman Phu Quoc Beachfront Luxury with All-Inclusive Dining & Daily Drinks
description:
World-class service and beachfront luxury await at Pullman Phu Quoc Beach Resort, a tropical five-star playground perched on the powder-white shores of Vietnam's most enviable island.

Swinging open its stylish doors in August 2020, this vibrant eco-resort invites cosmopolitan travellers to hop over from the mainland and experience Vietnam's natural beauty in style on the serene Phu Quoc Island. Set across seven acres of jungle-draped grounds, this flagship Pullman haven features a long list of ultra-luxe facilities including six bars and restaurants, a bamboo-lined spa retreat and an expansive lagoon pool with a swim-up lounge and sunken cabanas - all just steps from a private, 170-metre stretch of sand on Long Beach.

There's no shortage of fun-filled activities at Pullman Phu Quoc Beach Resort: borrow a bike and explore the resort on two wheels, enjoy a hit on the tennis courts or venture out into the crystal-clear waters on kayak or paddleboard. As the sun sets head to Beach House for drinks, dancing and good vibes.
offer_address: Tổ 6 Xóm Bàn Quy, Dương Tơ, Phú Quốc, Kiên Giang 920000, Vietnam

vendor_name: Sailing Club Signature Resort Phu Quoc
title: Grand Opening: Vietnam Private Pool Villas on Phu Quoc Island with Chef's Table & Wine Dinner, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Glide on the high seas of luxury with a stay at the newly-opened Sailing Club Signature Resort Phu Quoc - opened June 2022 - sequestered on the glimmering coastline of Vietnam's largest island, surrounded by UNESCO Biosphere Reserve. This bespoke resort leaves nothing to be desired, with private pool villas inspired by minimalistic Scandinavian design, a unique marketplace restaurant with an open-air concept, and one of the island’s top beach clubs - offering spectacular sunset vistas - within walking distance (or, a complimentary buggy ride).

Boasting verdant forests and 150km of beautiful, white-sand beaches, the serene Phu Quoc Island promises the ideal mix of bustling local life, opulent glamour, and marine adventure. Even though the picturesque island is packed with vibrant nightclubs and elegant bar lounges, it's also home to traditional fishing villages, historic Buddhist shrines, and tranquil waterfalls, meaning there's something for everyone.
location_description: Sailing Club Signature Resort Phu Quoc
offer_address: Group 6, Duong Bao Hamlet, Duong To Commune, Phu Quoc City, Kien Giang Province, Vietnam

vendor_name: Premier Residences Phu Quoc Emerald Bay
title: Five-Star Vietnam Beachfront Retreat with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktail & Spa Credit
description:
Where white sandy beaches, pristine waters and natural beauty are abundant, enter an island paradise at Premier Residences Phu Quoc Emerald Bay, Vietnam. Situated on one of the world's most beautiful beaches, Khem Beach, each of the hotel's thoughtfully designed spaces is complimented by the island's breathtaking tropical expanse. The 5000sqm infinity pool decorates its centre, where you can sip on a sunset cocktail and gaze out over the bay. When you're not cooling down at the pool, enjoy an array of Vietnamese and international cuisine at Mercato, breathe in the ocean and enjoy a light lunch at Clubhouse or indulge with a rejuvenating treatment at Emerald Spa.

If you're looking to explore, venture to the island's vibrant night markets, visit the enchanting Phu Quoc National Park or take a scenic cable ride. To round out your island stay, choose from the resort's array of resort activities, including outdoor yoga and beach games, or simply soak up the tranquillity in your suite - enjoy your Vietnamese escape your way.
location_description: Premier Residences Phu Quoc Emerald Bay
offer_address: Khem Beach, An Thoi, Phu Quoc, Kien Giang 920000, Vietnam

title: Vietnam All-Inclusive Pool Villas: Phu Quoc Beachfront Stay with Return Airport Transfers
description:
Vietnam’s ‘Pearl Island’ pristine beaches and mesmerising lakeside vistas await at the five-star Meliá Vinpearl Phu Quoc. With stunning private pool villas, this dream destination is the perfect escape for couples seeking luxurious seclusion, and groups of friends and families looking to create unforgettable memories in paradise. 

Take advantage of this glorious location, sipping cocktails by the sea as you watch the sun set below the glimmering horizon, followed by a wholesome movie night, cosied up on a beanbag with snacks at the beach cinema. Spend your days between dips in the pool, indulging in lavish spa treatments, or at the nearby beach with watersports including jet skiing and kayaking. 

The best of this luxury resort doesn’t stop there, with three restaurants to savour sublime dishes in the dreamiest of tropical destinations. Cape Nao restaurant sets the stage for unforgettable evenings, with a glamorous interior and international fine dining set against the backdrop of the pool and sparkling beach.
offer_address: Bai Dai, Ganh Dau, Phu Quoc Island 920000, Vietnam

title: Private Beach Getaway with Fabulous Dining Inclusions and Free-Flow Happy Hour
description: Experience pure bliss on the tropical getaway of your dreams at BW Premier Sonasea Phu Quoc. Here you will find a gorgeous private beach, picturesque lagoon-style pools, friendly hospitality and fantastic dining. Whether you’re planning a romantic couples’ escape or a holiday for the whole family, at BW Premier Sonasea Phu Quoc you can be sure that there’s something for everyone. Indulge with daily breakfast, your choice of daily lunch or dinner, a nightly free-flow Happy Hour with beer, wine and select spirits, a luxurious 60-minute massage and convenient return transfers from Phu Quoc Airport.
offer_address: Đường Bào, Phú Quốc, Kien Giang, Vietnam

title: Island Beachfront Bliss with Daily Dining and Nightly Cocktails
description: Discover beachfront tranquillity at the recently-opened Radisson Blu Phu Quoc, perched on Bai Dai Beach on Vietnam's lushest island. You’ll enjoy tropical luxury staying in an extra-spacious Deluxe Room with daily buffet breakfast, your choice of daily buffet lunch or dinner, nightly cocktail each and return airport transfers. Plus, one child (aged 11 years and under) stays free with all inclusions and complimentary daily access to the resort’s Giggles’ Kids Club.
offer_address: Ganh Dau Beach, Phu Quoc District, Ganh Dau, Phu Quoc, Vietnam

title: Pullman Phu Quoc Beachfront Luxury with All-Inclusive Dining, Daily Cocktails & Massages
description:
World-class service and beachfront luxury await at this all-inclusive retreat, a five-star playground perched on the powder-white shores of Vietnam's enviable island, Phu Quoc Island. This flagship Pullman haven features a long list of ultra-luxe facilities, including six bars and restaurants, a bamboo-lined spa retreat and an expansive lagoon pool with a swim-up lounge and sunken cabanas - all just steps from a private, 150-metre stretch of sand on Long Beach. With all-inclusive dining and a daily two-hour free-flow drinks session included, this is your invitation to slip into paradise.

There's no shortage of fun-filled activities at Pullman Phu Quoc Beach Resort: borrow a bike and explore the resort on two wheels, enjoy a hit on the tennis courts or venture out into the crystal-clear waters on a kayak or paddleboard. As the sun sets, head to Beach House for drinks, dancing and good vibes.
offer_address: Tổ 6 Xóm Bàn Quy, Dương Tơ, Phú Quốc, Kiên Giang 920000, Vietnam

vendor_name: Wyndham Grand Phu Quoc (formerly VinOasis Phu Quoc)
title: Grand Opening: Beachfront Fun at VinOasis Phu Quoc
description: Be one of the first guests to stay at the brand new VinOasis Phu Quoc, located just minutes away from the stunning Bai Dai Beach, in Vietnam’s most picturesque island - Phu Quoc. Spend six nights in this amazing new resort and get the full celebrity treatment: enjoy daily breakfasts, your choice of lunch or dinner every day, one nightly cocktail per person, one relaxing 60-minute body massage for two and return airport transfers. Plus, enjoy a world of entertainment with unlimited access to Vinpearl Land amusement park and Vinpearl Safari, located minutes away from the resort. Bring the kids along, as this fun-filled holiday will see two kids aged 11 and under stay for free!
offer_address: Bai Dai Beach, Ganh Dau Commune, Phu Quoc, Kien Giang, Vietnam

title: Pullman Phu Quoc Beachfront Luxury with Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch or Dinner, Nightly Drinks & Massages
description:
World-class service and beachfront luxury await at Pullman Phu Quoc Beach Resort, a tropical five-star playground perched on the powder-white shores of Vietnam's most enviable island. This vibrant eco-resort invites cosmopolitan travellers to hop over from the mainland and experience Vietnam's natural beauty in style on the serene Phu Quoc Island. Set across seven acres of jungle-draped grounds, this flagship Pullman haven features a long list of ultra-luxe facilities including six bars and restaurants, a bamboo-lined spa retreat and an expansive lagoon pool with a swim-up lounge and sunken cabanas - all just steps from a private, 150-metre stretch of sand on Long Beach.

There's no shortage of fun-filled activities at Pullman Phu Quoc Beach Resort: borrow a bike and explore the resort on two wheels, enjoy a hit on the tennis courts or venture out into the crystal-clear waters on a kayak or paddleboard. vendor_name: Intercontinental   Phu Quoc  Long Beach Resort
title: Stylish Phu Quoc Long Beach Resort with Island's Highest Rooftop Bar
description: Savour every spectacular seaside sunset with a stay at InterContinental Phu Quoc Long Beach Resort, an IHG Hotel, positioned on the western golden shores of Vietnam’s most beloved paradise island. Savour locally-caught seafood under the stars at LAVA, avant-garde cocktails at Phu Quoc’s highest skybar - Ink 360 - and casual beachside plates at Sea Shack, or head to HARNN Heritage Spa for traditional treatments over the resort's soul-stirringly serene, lotus-filled lagoon.
location_description: InterContinental Phu Quoc Long Beach Resort, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Bai Truong, Dương Tơ, Ward, Kiên Giang 920000, Vietnam

title: Stylish Five-Star Phu Quoc Stay with Rooftop Pool
description: Escape to the Regent Phu Quoc, an idyllic tropical retreat perfectly illuminated by the setting sun. Savour gastronomic experiences at the onsite restaurants and artisanal cocktails at the rooftop bar. Find moments of tranquility with indulgent spa treatments and yoga classes. Work up a sweat in the 24-hour fitness centre or take a refreshing dip in the rooftop pool. Walk through pristine white sands, take in tropical vistas or dip into crystal-clear waters before retiring to your sumptuous suite.
location_description: Regent Phu Quoc, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Bai Truong, Duong To, Phu Quoc, Kien Giang, 92509, Vietnam

title: Pullman Phu Quoc Beachfront Luxury with Six Restaurants & Lagoon Pool
description:
Bask in the captivating allure of Phu Quoc - Vietnam's largest island - at this five-star Pullman sanctuary, blending an enviable mix of world-class service and beachfront luxury. This flagship Pullman resort sprawls over seven hectares and boasts an impressive, unique design accentuated by fluid lines, curious artwork and decadent rooms.

Spend your days under the tropical sun swimming in the expansive lagoon pool, dip your toes in the powder-soft sands of the private Long Beach and venture out into the translucent waters of the Gulf of Thailand on a kayak or a paddleboard. Plus, you can delight your tastebuds across the resort's six restaurants and bars, including a steakhouse, and a seafood pop-up as you sip on signature cocktails while catching epic ocean sunsets.
offer_address: Group 6 Ban Quy Hamlet Duong To Commune, Phu Quoc 920000, Vietnam

vendor_name: la Verandah Resort - Phu Quoc -MGallery Collection
title: French Mansion-Inspired Phu Quoc Beachfront Haven with Two Restaurants & Pool
description:
Overlooking the azure waters of the Gulf of Thailand and nestled amid lush tropical gardens, embrace a world of tropical bliss with a stay at this Phu Quoc resort inspired by the grandeur of a 1920s French colonial mansion. A part of the MGallery Hotel Collection, this boutique five-star property is thoughtfully crafted with deep, private balconies, high ceilings and vintage collectables furnishing its spacious rooms.

Feel the romance in the air of this picturesque Vietnamese island as you lounge by the pool, sip on tiki cocktails from the beachfront Le Bar and feast on French and Mediterranean delicacies at The Peppertree and Le Jardin. For some pampering, head to TĨNH Wellness Sanctuary and indulge in restorative treatments. When you're not beach hopping, explore the vibrant Duong Dong Market and visit the traditional fishing villages.
location_description: La Veranda Resort Phu Quoc - MGallery
offer_address: Tran Hung Dao Street, Duong Dong Beach, 95000 Phu Quoc, Vietnam

title: Phu Quoc Movenpick Luxury with Onsite Dining, Beachfront Infinity Pool & Spa
description:
Experience the best of barefoot luxury on the shores of the idyllic Phu Quoc island at this five-star family-friendly resort. Indulge in world-class dining at the onsite restaurants, serving a fusion of local and international cuisine, or sip on handcrafted cocktails at the poolside Aura Beach Club, offering panoramic views of the sparkling sea. 

Venture out to explore the island's vibrant night markets, lush national parks and traditional fishing villages. For a unique experience, take a boat trip to the surrounding islands for snorkelling or diving. Back at the hotel, relax in the infinity pool, rejuvenate at the state-of-the-art spa or keep active at the fully equipped fitness centre.
offer_address: Ong Lang Beach Cua Duong Village Phu Quoc District, Phu Quoc 92000, Vietnam

title: Five-Star Award-Winning Phu Quoc Island Resort with Private Beachfront
description:
You get the best of both worlds at the multi-award-winning Salinda Resort Phu Quoc - rated in Condé Nast Travelers’ Readers’ Choice top 30 resorts in Asia for 2020 and ranked among Vietnam’s top 25 hotels in Tripadvisor’s Best of the Best 2021 awards. This eco-friendly property on Vietnam’s largest island boasts a pristine private beach and lush, secluded gardens, yet is close to the buzz of Duong Dong town centre and Long Beach’s popular 20km stretch.

Wake to the sound of birdsong and the lapping ocean in this sustainable, solar-friendly oasis, designed with suites and villas that bring the outside in. Then, join a master Indian practitioner for complimentary hatha yoga, explore the island via bike (free for in-house guests) or plunge into the palm tree-fringed saltwater infinity pool. Drink in ocean vistas from one of the deck chairs scattered along the golden beachfront or indulge with a massage at the onsite spa while the younger members of the family are at the Kids’ Club. In the evenings, take your pick from three onsite restaurants, including the award-winning iL Muro Italiano and Pakka Indian - both recognised at the World Luxury Restaurant Awards 2020.

With the hotel located just a 10-minute drive from Phu Quoc International Airport, you’ll have sand between your toes and a cocktail in hand in no time, watching the sunset over the ocean at this secluded five-star retreat.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions (select packages):**

- Indulge in **daily** **buffet** **breakfast** at Salinda Restaurant
- Unwind with a **daily signature cocktail, beer or glass of wine** per adult
- Enjoy one **lunch or dinner for two** at one of the onsite restaurants (for stays of 3+ nights)
- Treat yourself to one **60-minute Thai massage** **per adult** (for stays of 5+ nights)
- Splurge with **US$100** **resort** **credit** per package (for stays of 7+ nights)
- Enjoy an **additional lunch or dinner for two** (two total; for stays of 9+ nights)

**Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice, Best of the Best 2021** Top 25 Hotels - Vietnam

**Pearl Suite Villa Upgrade:** The largest of all the villas on the property, this glorious accommodation has a marble bathroom with a freestanding bathtub and spacious private terrace enveloped by the resort’s lush gardens.
offer_address: 1 Trần Hưng Đạo, Dương Tơ, Phú Quốc, tỉnh Kiên Giang, Vietnam

title: Vietnam Family-Friendly Seaside Luxury in Phu Quoc with Oversized Pool & Spa
description:
Nestled along the pristine shores of Ong Lang Beach, your tropical island paradise awaits. Designed to inspire connection and relaxation, this Mövenpick gem offers an abundance of facilities for all ages, including a sprawling beachfront pool, a fun-for-all kids' club and the brand's iconic Chocolate Hour experience.

Savour 70 years of Mövenpick’s culinary heritage at one of two restaurants, rejuvenate in a luxurious spa with 15 treatment rooms and enjoy refreshing tipples at the Beach Club or Waverley Lounge. When it's time to explore, the bustling Duong Dong town, with its colourful markets and seafood restaurants, is just a short drive away.
offer_address: Ong Lang Hamlet, Cua Duong Village, Phu Quoc 92000, Vietnam

title: Phu Quoc Five-Star Private Villa Escape with Private Beach, Onsite Spa & Restaurant
description: Experience the magic of Vietnam's largest island at this luxurious five-star resort, boasting stunning architecture, modern amenities and world-class dining. Discover child-like wonder at the VinWonders Phu Quoc theme park, or practice your swing at Vinpearl Golf Phu Quoc - both nearby. During times of relaxation lounge by the glistening pools, unwind on the stretch of private beach, and retreat to the tranquil spa before luxuriating in your lavish villa.
offer_address: Bai Dai Area, Ganh Dau Commune, Phu Quoc City, Kien Giang Province, Vietnam

vendor_name: Crowne Plaza Phu Quoc Starbay Vietnam
title: Beachfront Phu Quoc Haven with Ultra-Cool Beach Club
description: Wake up to the sounds of waves crashing from oceanfront paradise at Crowne Plaza Phu Quoc Starbay, an IHG Hotel. With the idyllic Bai Dai beach at its doorstep, the hotel is in prime position for seaside enjoyment. When you're not lapping up the laidback coastal vibes, enjoy a splash in the hotel swimming pool, be wined and dined at the Horizons Restaurant, or live it up at the ultra-cool Amber Sands Beach Club. If you have kids in tow, drop them off at Tribe Kids' Club for endless fun.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Phu Quoc Starbay, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Khu Du Lich Bai Dai, Ganh Dau, Phu Quoc 920000, Vietnam
